review: Could be little bit better but it is ok I would recommend

review: Constantly buffered and would drop the WiFi connection constantly. I tried every trick to get it working  but finally gave up and returned it. It was less than 10 feet from the router, and my 50 Mb Internet connection should have been plenty because Roku worked fine. If you buy it, good luck.
author: Amazon Customer

review: works great and it synced also to my computer. also works well with my amazon account to purchase items on netflix

review: Quick setup, fast streaming, works great with Prime Videos etc.
